entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
